Posts.Content: Hey thanks for reply and info. Helped loads actually at least I no I'm not going mad. thanks again g n j
Posts.Title: Im newby here

Posts.Content: Hi I posted earlier but wrong group so ill try again lol. I'm 47 and have breast cancer..huff.  I had my op 18.4.16, lumpectomy plus lymph nodes taken out another lump behind 1st so clearance margin not clear. Another op after chemo. I have so much pain in what's left of my breast, like glass in it. Will this subside?any ideas how long before chemo?  Any advice please as I'm at a loss. Many thanks
Posts.Title: Im newby here

Posts.Content: Thanks for your help sister . Means a lot just someone answering lol. Thank again xx
Posts.Title: Im newby here

Posts.Content: Afternoon everyone, had my chemo consult last Wednesday with  my partner. All was well until he explained that my cancer MAY be hereditary as my material aunt died of breast cancer at 54 ,I'm 48. I'll be joining a trial that enables you to have the test and get results in 2 weeks. I have 2 grown up daughter that I'm worried about.  Also my cancer is potentially high at coming back. I'll be having chemo in next 2-3 weeks. Fec-t. Reading people's story's on here I'm capping myself, not for chemo, or loosing my hair. .It is what it is.. its the side effects you all are having trouble with ie nausea sickness pain in legs etc. . Does anyone no anything I could do be doing to help myself get through this. I'm usually in good spirits but all this is plaguing me. Xx
Posts.Title: Chemo consult

Posts.Content: Hi justlittleme  and everyone else. .. how are you all doing. Iv got op day 1st March but go in afternoon before. Hope u r all doing well. Much love xx

Posts.Content: Hellooooo justlittleme bless u.. this will be me in a few weeks time so please keep me posted how ur doing chicken. Take it steady lass and stay positive. Much love xx

Posts.Title: Last chemo today, what a journey!!

Posts.Content: Hey there. I've been and had it drained again this morn. I did ask about a compression dressing ect bcn said no they do it now ??? So no doubt I'll be back nx week. Thank you so much for getting in touch xx
Posts.Title: Post Surgery Seroma Problems - Advice Please...

Posts.Content: Oh my word ..I work for tesco lol.. Thanks so much for answering put my mind at rest I thought I was being mardy. U take care xx
Posts.Title: Post Surgery Seroma Problems - Advice Please...

Posts.Content: Hi iv just this afternoon had a picc line put in ..in my arm. My veins are buggered so asked for one. Go for 4th chemo  the T part..in morning so I just want to crack on now because of how painful the first 3 were thro a canular it can't be any worse but I'm feeling positive. Process wasn't bad at all and had no issues. So good luck sunshine x
Posts.Title: Anyone had a Portacath in their arm? The one under the skin?

Posts.Content: Evening ladeeezz. I start fec chemo 23 June 9am. Looking forward to it now as I want rid of these gremlins. Had lwi 4cm and node clearance. Got 6 rounds to do then surgery again then radiotherapy. I've been wig shopping with me mammy and I got 2. One called naomi and other called Venus lol. Made us laugh. Good luck to everyone that finds themselves on this manic roller coaster of an adventure. Xxx
Posts.Title: ***june chemo club***

Posts.Content: You made me laugh pennymoon on bus lol. I'm waiting for date for mastectomy reconstruction  but other half said he's excited as we're naming them. The twin girls so any ideas for names greatfuly received. Lol. As for original post you can do this lass with or without a bloke. You can just concentrate on you and that the most important thing you.  Much love to all xx
Posts.Title: Primary cancer and secondary cancer

Posts.Content: Hi grannies could I ask what you've got in your poppins bag please..I start chemo 23 June been shopping today for wigs and I got 2. One called naomi and the other called Venus so that's what I'm calling the girls. Good luck  with your chemo and take care xx
Posts.Title: 2nd chemo tomorrow

Posts.Content: Aup londonlass. hope your OK apart from this crap New event for you... the inability to link 2 words together or any sentence really.  Or spell fgs. takes me ages to either write or tx. it's ridiculous lol.  Mind you nowt new there I talk crap most of  the time.. glad were having a giggle xx
